title: What do you think of Kled
body: Personally I think Kled looks like a lot of fun to play but he is just so unbalanced i have faced 7 Kled's and every game I have lost because he just builds tank so you can't harm him then after 5 autos he just regenerates all his health and 1 shots me. When I faced one playing Akali I went invisible and he could still auto me and so he 1 shot me again. So all in all i just think he need to be more balanced to play against.

replies.body:
42% winrate*

Also, you played against Kled in normals only. You happen to never play ranked, so maybe it's because the other player is simply stronger than you.
